latest_revision.text:
Here are the step-by-step instructions on how to create a ticketed event for Heatsync.  This can be used for RSVP hosted hours or other events.

* Login to [https://guestlist.co/ guestlist.co]
** Username: instructors@heatsynclabs.org
** Password: [https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/hunter2 Hunter2]    (Not really.  You'll have to get it from an existing member)
* Go to the [https://guestlist.co/manage/events Dashboard] (upper left corner) 
* Find a class/hosting that looks like yours and copy it. 
[[File:copy.png|500px]]
** Edit the date and time.
** Edit the tickets details.
** Lather
** Edit event details
** Preview.
** Rinse.
** Correct errors.
** Preview again.
** Repeat
* Publish.
[[File:guestlistdashboard.png|500px]]
* Copy link.
* Share link.
* Log in prior to event to see who has signed up.

==Notes==
* [https://guestli.st/677631 Example]
* You can make drafts very easily.  The only thing you want to not do is delete someone else's event
